Verses: 1 saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaiyum Raaja Aramanaiyaiyum, Thaan Seyyavendum Endru Virumbina Ellaavatraiyum Katti Mudiththapinbu,
2 karththar Kibiyonile Saalomonukku Dharisanamaanadhupola, Irandaandharamum Avanukku Dharisanamaanaar.

3 karththar Avanai Nokki: Nee En Samugaththil Seydha Un Vinnappaththaiyum Un Vendudhalaiyum Ketten; Nee Kattina Indha Aalayaththil En Naamam Endraikkum Vilangaththakkadhaaga, Adhaip Parisuththamaakkinen; En Kangalum En Irudhayamum Ennaalum Angeyirukkum.

4 naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyitta Ellaavatraiyum Nee Seydhu, En Kattalaigalaiyum En Nyaayangalaiyum Kaikkollumpadikku, En Samugaththil Mana Uththamamum Semmaiyumaai Un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Nadandhadhupola Nadappaayaanaal,

5 isravelin Singaasanaththinmel Utkaarum Purushan Unakku Illaamarpovadhillai Endru Un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhode Naan Sonnapadiye, Isravelinmelulla Un Raajyabaaraththin Singaasanaththai Endraikkum Nilaikkappannuven.

6 neengalum Ungal Pillaigalum Ennaivittup Pinvaangi, Naan Ungalukku Munvaiththa En Karpanaigalaiyum En Kattalaigalaiyum Kaikkollaamarpoi, Vere Dhevargalai Seviththu, Avaigalaip Panindhukolveergalaagil,

7 naan Isravelukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththile Avargalai Vaikkaadhapadikku Nirmoolamaakki, En Naamam Vilanga Naan Parisuththamaakkina Indha Aalayaththai En Samugaththaivittuth Thalluven; Appozhudhu Isravel Sagala Janangalukkullum Pazhamozhiyaagavum Vasai Sollaagavum Iruppaargal.

8 appozhudhu Unnadhamaayirukkira Indha Aalayaththaik Kadandhupogiravan Evanum Bramiththu, Pakidiyaai Eesalittu; Karththar Indha Dhesaththukkum Indha Aalayaththukkum Ippadi Seydhadhu Enna? Endru Ketpaargal.

9 adharku Avargal: Thangal Pidhaakkalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraivittu, Vere Dhevargalaip Patrik Kondu, Avargalai Namaskariththu Seviththapadiyinaal, Karththar Indhath Theengaiyellaam Avargalmel Varappanninaar Endru Solluvaargal Endraar.
10 saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayamum Raaja Aramanaiyumaagiya Irandu Maaligaigalaiyum Katti Niraivetrugira Irubadhaam Varusham Mudivile,

11 thannudaiya Viruppaththinpadiyellaam Thanakkuk Kedhurumarangalaiyum, Dhevadhaari Virutchangalaiyum, Ponnaiyum Koduththuvandha Theeruvin Raajaavaagiya Eeraamukku, Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Kalileyaa Naattilulla Irubadhu Pattanangalaik Koduththaan.
12 eeraam Thanakku Saalomon Koduththa Pattanangalaip Paarkkiradharkuth Theeruvilirundhu Purappattuvandhaan; Avaigalil Avan Piriyappadavillai.
13 adhanaale Avan: En Sagodharane, Neer Enakkuk Koduththa Indhap Pattanangal Enna Pattanangal? Endraan. Avaigalukku Innaalmattum Vazhangivarugirapadi Kaabool Naadu Endru Perittaan.
14 eeraam Raajaavukku Nootrirubadhu Thaalandhu Pon Anuppiyirundhaan.
15 pidiththa Amanji Aatkalaikkondu Saalomon Raajaa Dhaan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaiyum, Than Aramanaiyaiyum, Millovaiyum, Erusalemin Madhilaiyum, Aadhsoraiyum, Megidhovaiyum, Keseraiyum Kattinaan.

16 keserai En Kattinaan Endraal, Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvon Purappattuvandhu, Andhak Keserpattanaththaip Pidiththu, Adhai Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu, Adhile Kudiyirundha Kaanaaniyaraik Kondrupottu, Adhai Saalomonin Manaiviyaagiya Than Kumaaraththikku Seedhanamaagak Koduththirundhaan.
17 saalomon Andhak Keserpattanaththaiyum, Keezhppeththoronaiyum.
18 paalaaththaiyum, Vanaandharaveliyilulla Thadhmoraiyum,

19 thanakku Irukkira Rasthukkalai Vaikkum Sagala Pattanangalaiyum, Radhangal Irukkum Pattanangalaiyum, Kudhirai Veerar Irukkum Pattanangalaiyum, Erusalemilum Leebanonilum, Thaan Arasaanda Dhesamengum Thanakku Ishtamaanadhaiyellaam Kattinaan.
20 isravel Puththirar Sangaaram Pannak Koodaamal Meendhirundha Isravel Puththirarin Jaadhiyallaadha Emoriyar, Eththiyar, Perisiyar, Eviyar, Eboosiyarumaana Sagala Janaththilum,
21 avargalukkup Piragu Dhesaththil Meendhirundha Sagala Janangaludaiya Pillaigalaiyum, Saalomon Innaalvaraikkum Nadakkiradhupola, Amanjivelai Seyya Adimaippaduththikkondaan.

22 isravel Puththiraril Oruvaraiyum Saalomon Adimaippaduththavillai; Avargal Yuththamanusharum, Avanukkup Panividaikkaararum, Prabukkalum, Servaikkaararum, Radhaveerarum, Kudhiraiveerarumaayirundhaargal.
23 ainnootraimbadhuper Saalomonin Velaiyai Visaariththu, Velaiyaatkalaik Kankaanikkiradharkuth Thalaimaiyaana Visaarippukkaararaayirundhaargal.
24 paarvonin Kumaaraththi, Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththilirundhu Saalomon Thanakkuk Kattina Than Maaligaiyile Kudivandhaal; Appozhudhu Millovaik Kattinaan.

25 saalomon Karththarin Aalayaththai Mudiththapinbu, Avarukkuk Kattina Palipeedaththinmel Varushaththil Moondrumurai Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaana Paligalaiyum Ittu, Karththarin Sannidhiyil Irukkira Palipeedaththinmel Thoobankaattivandhaan.
26 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Edhom Dhesaththil Sivandha Samuththirakkaraiyile Eloththukku Sameebaththilulla Esiyonkeperile Kappalgalai Seyviththaan.
27 andhak Kappalgalil Eeraam Samuththira Yaaththiraiyil Pazhagina Kappalaatkalaagiya Than Velaikkaararai Saalomonudaiya Velaikkaararodekooda Anuppinaan.
28 avargal Oppeerukkuppoi, Avvidaththilirundhu Naanootru Irubadhu Thaalandhu Ponnai Raajaavaagiya Saalomonidaththil Konduvandhaargal.
